name: Walkway Mod
short_description:
Walkway Mod
1.2.5
V.3.2
(now includes AUTO INSTALLER)
*NOTICE ABOUT REDISTREBUTION*
when i googled "Walkway mod" i found that people posted my mod and took credit for it. i will allow people to post my mods IF the download link goes DIRECTLY to the PMC page for it and that the photos that came with the mod are not to be edited (that means no logos, slogans, etc).
thank you, and have a good day.
(mojang gives modders complete controll over their mods name, distrebution, etc)

 
tired of having to walk from place to place "slowly"? are minecarts too slow? the walkway mod is like one of those walkways you see at the airport but much faster. 
How to install:
7zip
MODLOADER IS REQUIRED! I DO NOT PROVIDE!
o0o-----.:: READ THE README!::.-----o0o
(readme is in the downloaded file)

i understand that this mod is not compatible with some mods but if you want them to be you MUST send me a download link so i can read their java code and remake mine to suit your needs.
